title: Strengthening Learning Design Practical Competencies: Analyzing and Improving the Effectiveness of Remote Education in Nursing

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational nursing theory and practical experience, online learning platform usage experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can apply digital literacy and self-directed learning strategies required in remote education environments.
Learners can analyze survey-based data to evaluate influencing factors and depth of learning in remote nursing education.
Learners can design theory-practice integrated learning models in blended education environments and predict their effectiveness.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
